subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
• Instructions: o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella.
o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest.

Banh Beo • Ingredients: o 1 cup rice flour o 1/2 cup water o 1/2 cup coconut milk o 1/4 cup shrimp o 1/4 cup green onions o 1/4 cup fried shallots o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon sugar • Instructions: o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, salt, and sugar to form a batter.
